price: "Korkmayın! Ben sizinle beraberim. İşitir ve görürüm." diye buyurdu.
arabic: قَالَ لَا تَخَافَآۖ إِنَّنِي مَعَكُمَآ أَسۡمَعُ وَأَرَىٰ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla lā takhāfā innanī maʿakumā asmaʿu wa-arā
